thread.title: Sienna Miller denies flirting with Brad Pitt
thread.title_full: Sienna Miller denies flirting with Brad Pitt - Bangalore Mirror

author: bangaloremirror.com
title: Sienna Miller denies flirting with Brad Pitt
text:
Actress Sienna Miller has finally broken her silence on rumours saying that she's getting flirtatious with Brad Pitt.
Miller, who was rumoured to have a special relationship with Pitt as they are working on a project together, set the record straight on the allegations and said she didn't "read too much about it," reports aceshowbiz.com. Pitt is the producer of the upcoming action adventure biographical movie The Lost City of Z, which stars Miller.
"The brilliant thing about that rumour is that I haven't really read much about it. So this is the truth, Brad Pitt is producing the movie that I just wrapped but I didn't see him, he's not been to the set," Miller said on rapper Eminem's hip-hop channel SiriusXM's Shade 45. The cheating allegations were first reported by In Touch magazine which claimed that Angelina Jolie was "consumed by jealousy."
